website_summaries.verdict: This is a foaming cleanser that's suitable for all skin types. Apricot kernal and avocado oils ensure a gentle cleanse without overdying.
pros: The texture is a pleasant mix between gel and foam that feels great on skin
A little goes a long way
cons: May be a little too strong for ultra-sensitive or severely dry skin types

customer_reviews.title: So clean and so soft
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best face wash I have ever used. I have very sensitive skin and cannot use any soaps/face washes with any chemicals. The first time I used it, my skin felt like silk. No tightening, no itching... just a clean face. I suffer from sensitive skin (face and body) and this company truly delivers on their promise. For anyone suffering from dry, sensitive skin... this product is amazing. Hope this helps those in search of finding a solution to skin issues. Disclaimer: I bought this with my own money. This is an honest review and not a paid for review.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome natural product!
customer_reviews.text: I was in search of a natural yet effective product that would remove waterproof makeup without stripping moisture from my skin, and still be good to the environment. This product checks all those boxes and then some because it also serves a humanitarian cause if you read their bio, not only do they make my skin better, but they make the world a better place as well! I will say for heavy waterproof mascara, liner, or long lasting foundation, you may need a couple rinses, but I promise it will all come off and your skin won't feel like paper! :)
customer_reviews.author: Viviana L. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this product for any skin type
customer_reviews.text: I've grown up with eczema and this cleanser is gentle enough to not irritate my skin. It keeps my skin moisturized and also relieves my redness! I would highly recommend this product for any skin type. The packaging makes the product really easy to pump out, and 2-3 pumps usually does the trick for me. The cleanser lathers nicely too! Definitely purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: allikimm

customer_reviews.title: Amazing face wash, must have!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the relaxing lavender face wash consistently for nearly 2 years now and it is my absolute favorite product. I love the minimal and natural ingredient list, not forgetting to mention discovering the magic of soapberries through it. I appreciate how the product always leaves my skin feeling clean and still hydrated too. I feel like I can wash my face multiple times a day with this if needed and it won't ever dry my skin out. It also does a pretty good job of removing any makeup I have on at the end of the day too, no need for additional makeup remover :)
customer_reviews.author: DO

customer_reviews.title: Non-irritating but drying
customer_reviews.text: Gentle ingredients, did not irritate my face or break it out. However, I found it to be quite drying. My skin type is acne prone, a little bit oily, but mostly pretty normal. This made my skin feel dry and tight after usage.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole R.

customer_reviews.title: Started burning my face
customer_reviews.text: I have fair and sensitive skin so thought this would be a safe bet. I used it (unscented + this one) for months and noticed some red spots on my skin, but thought it was something else causing it. As time went on it got worse and worse, my face would get so red after I washed it (which cued me to the product) and then started burning, stinging, peeling and itching as if I got sunburn. I switched to a different cleanser and my skin has started to heal now. Pretty disappointed and annoyed I have to repair my face after much agony. Not sure what I could be allergic to that's in it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Pricing skyrocketing unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a little over a month ago and really enjoyed it. As I am coming to the end of my bottle I went to reorder, only to find the price skyrocketed since I bought it last. I was fully prepared to have this be my new forever face wash but won’t reorder if it went up that much in such a short period of time. Not a good deal for me personally to have to pay $7 more every time I reorder my face wash! If anyone has any suggestions for similar products with stable pricing I would love to hear them! Thanks :)
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Most gentle OTC face wash
customer_reviews.text: This is the only pH balanced face wash available in the market that can be useful for every acne types. I had a “severe” acne breakouts for “2 years”. I used dozen of OTC face washes. This soapberry product is the only face wash I found effective. However, this doesn’t cure your acne problem, but definitely this will helps stop future acne breakouts. (I healed my acne with Neutrogena acne cleanser with 10% Benzoyl Peroxide and since then I am using this face wash daily.
customer_reviews.author: Sahaj

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this wash
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this wash. I had been using harsh acne face washes to try to control my acne and decided to give this a try after talking to a few friends who used other gentle cleaners for their face. This was cruelty-free, eco-friendly, and hypo-allergenic. Also love the smell! Will buy again when it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Liana

customer_reviews.title: The definitive cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a face wash that can control my oily skin without drying out my skin. This face wash fits the bill. It foams to a soft, natural consistency, it's super gentle and free of parabens and harsh chemicals. It doesn't cause breakouts on my skin, and it's worked really well at clearing out the breakouts that I already had. This is my new favorite cleanser!
customer_reviews.author: S. Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, love the origins!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent so much time and money searching for products to cater to my picky skin, and I found that less is more when searching for a product that makes your skin happy. I have roscesa prone skin during the stressful months of school along with off and on oily combination skin. I have found that the less ingredient organic products are what work the best, compared to expensive name brand "market specific" products. So happy with my purchase, and look forwards to expanding on trying other items from this company!! Keep it simple :)
customer_reviews.author: Emma Horoszczak

customer_reviews.title: Will absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my daughter to try out as she has been on antibiotics and prescription creams for a while for her acne and she wanted to stop taking the antibiotics. She said the first time she used it the redness in her cheeks went down and her face feels so much softer. Her acne is almost gone after a week of using this product. Definitely going to purchase some for my son and for me to use as I occasionally get pimples. Will absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I'm very picky with skin care and decided to try this based on the great reviews. I am very happy with my purchase. Two weeks into using this, my skin is softer and not irritated. It actually got rid of some dry spots I had on my face. The smell is amazing. It's a clean and fresh scent. The lavender scent is calming and relaxing as well. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kenan

customer_reviews.title: I reallly love his face cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I reallly love his face cleanser, it doesn't lather much but my skin feels soft and clean after a heavy workout at the gym. This product also doesn't sting my eyes when I use it with water, smells lovely I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Calmed and cleaned my skin
customer_reviews.text: This soap works wonderfully. I love the very natural lavender scent. The only thing that takes some getting used to is that it doesn't lather as much as you're used to. It is also a bit liquidy, so I have a hard time getting in from my hand, onto my face without it all spilling down my arm before it gets there lol. But I really like how it makes my face feel clean and my skin feel calm. Some natural soaps struggle to take makeup off and give you a clean feeling, but this soap is great! Doesn't dry my skin out at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee Nyman

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work as expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product so that I could mix it with another product for Maskne (10% Azaelic Acid serum). I wanted something soothing and liked the pump dispenser. It has a tea tree smell that I evidently am not a fan of... thus the removed stars. Other then that, it is working as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Acne, dryness, redness, and all gone! Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: OKAY, Y'ALL HAVE TO BUY THIS. I would suffer from lots of acne problems since a young age and I've tried everything under the moon. Creams, washes, toners... You name it. NOTHING COMPARES TO THIS. I have PERFECT skin now. I do not have a single blemish. I *only* use this face wash and it has been leaving my skin amazing. I've been using for a couple of months now. ALSO, it's soft and gentle enough that it removes all my makeup... Even mascara! Perfect product worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Gabrielle Duran

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’m really amazed by how well this worked ever since my pregnancy with preeclampsia my skin was horrible my high blood pressure caused permanent burns almost like rosacea I’ve tried absolutely everything and price was never an issue this was so calming on my skin my rosacea looked almost gone I was so amazed it took care of all my problem areas and really balanced my skin I’m so surprised I will be re purchasing for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: BEST FACE WASH
customer_reviews.text: Love LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE this face wash. My face has never felt so clean an soft. I will never use another face wash.
customer_reviews.author: loriann

customer_reviews.title: Cystic acne
customer_reviews.text: My skin is normal and has always been very, very good. After using this I've been breaking out in painful cystic acne. Coincidence?
customer_reviews.author: Gary Campbell

customer_reviews.title: It's ok....
customer_reviews.text: I like the ingredients generally and I like the skin feel but this smells nothing at all like lavender....and I mean not at ALL. Just smells mostly like soapberries....I wanted it to smell like lavender. So, bummed about the smell, which I am very particular about, but an ok face wash. Would not buy it again due to the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly T.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful all natural product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product on a recommendation from a friend for my daughter's acne breakouts. I love that it is all natural and gentle on her skin. I remember using every harsh cleanser on the market when I was a teen and none of them actually helping my acne. I'm glad I have better options to give my daughter. Within a week her face had cleared up quite a bit. She still had a few smaller pimples, but the large red ones were gone. It is gentle and doesn't dry her skin out.
customer_reviews.author: C. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: lovely product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this face wash. My previous face wash was also a PH of 5.5 and I actually came upon this one by searching on amazon for a refill of my last face was. I didn't realize there was another natural brand with this same PH level. I saw this one was organic while my previous was just claiming to be "natural" so I gave this a try. I really think this PH balance stuff is important, otherwise your skin dries out like crazy. This soapberry face wash is mild, effective, organic and an family owned company-all things I like to support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have had bad acne since I was a teenager, as an adult, I had hoped to grow out of it but haven’t. I’ve used many different products on my face and the treetotub face wash is amazing. I have very few breakouts. It gentle and leaves my skin clean but not dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on my face
customer_reviews.text: It is the second time I buy that product. I like the scent and the foam aspect. It is very gentle on my face and I have a very sensitive skin. I like the soap berries. It is a much better approach for me. I definitively recommend that product.
customer_reviews.author: Mom At Home

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash ever!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been using Soapberry for Face for a number of months now. We were initially drawn to try it because of the important pH balance. Many products are not at the proper pH for skin, and most people are unaware. I love everything about this product. As noted by others, it helps with our rosacea, is manufactured with eco-conscious principles in mind, smells heavenly, and cleans so effectively without drying or leaving a film behind. I recommend Soapberry for Face wholeheartedly!!
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Nana

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the way this was packaged by the seller was very thoughtful and beautifully presented. Second of all, the product itself has left my skin feeling so soft and blemish free for the past week. The smell is great. Ane most importantly it is not filled with harsh chemicals. I have already recommended to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Dried my skin out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would be gentle since my skin is dry in the winter. Unfortunately it's pretty drying. It does have a nice smell (lavender) and takes 3-4 pumps to get a good lather. It would probably last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: cat e

customer_reviews.title: I am never going back to a non Tree to Tub product again!
customer_reviews.text: Having struggled with acne into adulthood, I have tried every natural products routine out there to try to manage the health of my skin while keeping a close eye on the ingredients I'm putting on it. I was pulled toward tree to tub buy its ingredients and focus on treating the skin as the major body organ it is. I was so pleased to find a gentle product, that was focused on pH balance, yet able to perform as it said it would. I was so impressed by their face wash that I quickly purchase the whole product line and I'm really pleased with how the Hair, Skin, and Body products all work together.
customer_reviews.author: B.T

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked great for me and my sensitive skin. I would recommend to anyone. I love that it's actually natural ingredients and that it's PH balanced. My skin is super problematic, always has been, but it just recently started to be sensitive in the last couple years so I needed something without chemicals. Keeps my skin clear and feeling good. Try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Consider using in spring and summer?
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend this for those with dry skill during the winter. It's for dry skin but my skin has been irritated something horrible and massive dry spots and redness around my cheeks and mouth my moisturizer does not help.
customer_reviews.author: shauntwanette

customer_reviews.title: Pricey (pH hype?)
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying into the pH soap hype. The moment you put on regular facial lotion, the pH levels is broken anyway. Aveeno foam facial wash was just as good and 1/3 of its price.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Written by Joseph's fiancé This stuff is amazing! It takes a little while to get used ...
customer_reviews.text: Written by Joseph's fiancé This stuff is amazing! It takes a little while to get used to bc it doesn't have suds like regular soap but I have been using it for a week now and I can definitely tell a difference. My skin feels a lot softer and cleaner. It removes makeup really well. The lavendar smells amazing and it's really good to use right before bed bc the lavendar helps me sleep.
customer_reviews.author: J&C Arthur

customer_reviews.title: My only face wash
customer_reviews.text: I've lost track of how many times I've ordered this. This is my only cleanser for my face besides the occasional exfoliator. I use a moisturizer after this of course but the cleanser does not dry out my skin, it leaves it clean and fresh. No harsh scents and the foam is soft of course.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, Effective, Organic & Effective Skin Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, organic skin product that seems to be good for your skin! I have fair, sensitive, mature skin and this will clean your face including makeup without drying your skin out!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A. Szczesniak

customer_reviews.title: Great for the most sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the most sensitive skin. I only use this because any other face wash even if it claimed to be for sensitive skin, never helped but just irritated it. This helps heal scars and acne better than neutrogena which was what I was using before but I prefer this. My face is clear and glows a lot more even without makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Silvsabby

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and cleans great!
customer_reviews.text: This face wash is amazing!! The smell is gentle and it feels gentle!! I had to get my boyfriend to try it as well and now he is hooked on it! It makes our skin glow! I love it and will keep buying!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for dry, sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It cleans deeply yet doesn't dry my face out. It's not full of chemical junk. I've had no breakouts and it lathers very nicely. A little goes a long way - it feels like a luxury brand.
customer_reviews.author: Crayon

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and refreshing!!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I’m really enjoying this product! Lately My skin has been dry, so I wanted an oil base cleanser. It’s very gentle on the skin & the scent isn’t too powerful. I used to always get dry cracked skin on the corners of my mouth, and this face wash has completely soothed those spots! The only con is that I feel like I have to use a bit more product than I usually would because it doesn’t lather very much (that’s only because it’s organic). So it’s worth it to me! I will definitely be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: Really, really love this product does not leave my face dry and parched. I had used another product on my face that recked me until I got the Soapberry. From the first use there was a big difference. I am caught on Soapberry, it’s 2wks now that I am using it. I use one pump when I don’t have on makeup and 2 pumps to remove makeup.
customer_reviews.author: charm

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this face wash
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this face wash! Immediately, my face felt clean but also smooth and soft. I am noticing that my dry, flaky skin is going away! It does take about 3-4 pumps to get enough of a lather but I will continue to purchase this!
customer_reviews.author: MsBoosMom

customer_reviews.title: Best facial wash for me. From a Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I am a facial wash snob, I'd like them to lather well, last long, cleanse well, refresh and not dry my face. This Tree to Tub facial wash fit my every needs. I love the fact that it's natural and made from the soapberry. I've been into going back to the basics and using as much natural stuff as possible on both my face and hair. Remember everything we used sips through our skin into our bloodstream. A little goes a long way, you just need a small squirt and it lathers great. Highly recommend it. The packaging is well.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is just amazing. I love that it's natural and I dont feel worried to put it on my face because other face cleansers have so many chemicals. My skin always feels soft. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaykate

customer_reviews.title: Amazing face wash
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash. And for my sensitive skin, I'm so happy I found it. Leaves my skin feeling soft and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin or make my eczema flare up.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Natural cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Nice and natural face wash. Does not over dry the skin. I’m not a fan of their lavendar scent though. It does not have that clean fresh smell you would expect. I will buy again but this time the scent free one.
customer_reviews.author: TJS

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I have VERY sensitive skin (even most unscented lotions burn) and this face wash works great. I also have psoriasis and it doesn't seem to dry out my skin more than it already is. The scent is a little strong, but it didn't hurt much when I accidentally got a little in my eye while trying to wash it off. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent and feel!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely am in LOVE with this product so far! The scent is a nice, refreshing lavender and it leaves my skin feeling so clean afterwards. There is nothing negative to say about it. I have trouble with acne sometimes and it has not caused my face to breakout which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very natural and gentle
customer_reviews.text: I never feel like foam soaps/face washes clean as well, but this works ok. Love that it's vegan, is totally natural, and has a pleasant smell. Wouldn't but again though.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Brady

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is wonderful! At first the smell was like 😑 but I guess when your use to chemical junk bought at department stores you won't like the smell. But now I love the smell very relaxing and leaves my skin looking A1
customer_reviews.author: Ebony K.

customer_reviews.title: Soapberry love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this face wash! It is truly well suited for sensitive skin, whether or not you have combination/dry or acne prone (which lucky for me, I have sensitive/acne prone skin!) it works so well. I don't even have to use a moisturizer with it because it's not overly drying but you feel very clean and fresh afterward. I purchased the lavender scent which isn't overwhelming and very calming. Buy it if you've been looking for something natural and not insanely overpriced. Soapberries are a new obsession now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I had been using another face wash and was researching and found this one with same ingredients and threw caution to the wind and purchased it hoping it would continue to keep my skin from being oily.... and it’s Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Landrum

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash
customer_reviews.text: Great face wash. Some people are giving it bad reviews because it doesn’t remove makeup. It’s a face wash, not a makeup remover. Remove your makeup with a different product, then wash your face with this.
customer_reviews.author: CrystalQuartz

customer_reviews.title: SO disappointed that the size of this product got a whole ...
customer_reviews.text: SO disappointed that the size of this product got a whole 2fl oz smaller! I have reordered this several times and I was shocked when I opened this package to find how small it was! I LOVE this cleanser it really is great but im so unhappy its even smaller now and still around $21.....so disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Awesome facial wash
customer_reviews.text: I noticed the obvious difference the first time I used this product, it’s gentle yet cleanse well, but doesn’t make my face feel dry or rough. I’ve tried many face wash before, but I can say it confidently that this is the best face wash I’ve ever used. I’ll definitely get more and recommend to my friends. Thank you for the awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: XiaoQian Keren

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this high quality facial cleanser!!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend this face wash. The scent is amazing and it’s all natural. It’s perfectly balanced not drying and not overly moisturizing. It will be my face wash for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Fresh
customer_reviews.text: I have only used for a couple of days. I love the way it smells and how it leaves my skin feeling. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTI

customer_reviews.title: One pump gently cleanses & a nice mild scent
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say I felt it was moisturizing after cleansing, but one pump is enough to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: yanet

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It is really gentle on my sensitive skin and the smell is very nice. I do find that I need like 5-7 pumps to get a good lather but other than that I like it a lot and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for sensitive skin! I have extremely sensitive skin and break out if a product has even the slightest bit of artificial fragrance. This product is gentle on my skin and causes no irritation. I also like the smell! It is very subtle and refreshing, and makes me actually look forward to using it daily!
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Cleanses and soothes
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using the face wash for a few days but I already love it. My skin doesn't feel tight or dry and I have a lot less irritation. My face is usually very red and I always seem to have at least some breakout all the time but now the redness has subsided significantly and my breakouts are much less less inflamed. I'm hoping this will clear it up completely.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: There isn’t a lot of suds/foam like you would be used to
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly how it was describeD. There isn’t a lot of suds/foam like you would be used to, but it cleans wonderfully. The smell is also a clean fresh scent. I have used now for a few days and I would probably order again.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Clears blemishes within a week!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews, but this product is the answer to my prayers. I have been struggling with adult acne for months and could not find a natural product to solve the issue. After 5 days of using the face wash my skin has cleared up completely. And best of all, it works well with my sensitive skin. Just wish I would have found this product sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: I really love this gental, cleansing facewash
customer_reviews.text: I bought this immediately after buying another brand and not liking the way it made my skin feel. Very gentle, smooth and smells great. Is not drying at all but my skin feels very clean. It was my first purchase with Tree to Tub and I was not disappointed. I've bought several things from them so far but this is still my favorite. Would recommend and will likely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product!! So gentle on my skin and feels wonderful afterwards!!
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser
customer_reviews.text: There are no chemicals in this cleanser. It is all natural and does an amazing job. I have extremely sensitive skin and this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazing and is so far my favorite lavender face wash. I wouldn’t call it super moisturizing though.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It very gentle and foams nicely. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff I’m a new lifetime customer
customer_reviews.text: This face wash is amazing. It leaves your face feeling clean and fresh. I am not used to having my face feel clean without the tightness and dry feeling. My face is sensitive/ combination skin and up until now I could not find a face wash that could keep my face clean, minimize oil, hydrate and keep breakouts from occurring all at once. Went out on a limb and purchased this and I am so grateful I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great face wash, one of the best I’ve found. I love the foam and there will no waste involved as the soap is being used. That is a huge plus for me! Thanks again! Btw...is there a moisturizer in this line? Or a spray toner? That would be awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I used this product about 2 months now and my skin got even worse. I though it was just "purging". I went from having the common white heads now my acne is more cystic. My face looks horrible so bad that I'm going to see a dermatologist.
customer_reviews.author: Ladi Nai

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Cleans without drying. The fragrance is wonderful! Great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: mollycm

customer_reviews.title: Smells Like Honey!
customer_reviews.text: This facewash smells amazing like honey! Has great lather and rinses clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Very drying!!
customer_reviews.text: This face wash was very drying to both my daughter's skin and to mine. We wanted to return it but waited too long.
customer_reviews.author: KR Cannon

customer_reviews.title: A gentle and effective face wash
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle of the Soapberry for Face. It has a very soft scent, does not irritate my skin, removes my makeup, is reasonably priced, cruelty free, and free from junk. A great all-around face wash. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERRRY HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I TRULY ENJOY THIS CLEANSER, GENTLE, FOAMY. IT LEAVES MY FACE CLEAN , SOFT. I HAVE BEEN LOOKING FOR A FOAMING CLEANSER..... THIS ONE IS ON MY SIDE : ) MIKA
customer_reviews.author: dominique manasson

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice and fresh smelling. My skin feels clean and smooth afterwards. Don't expect a lot of suds but that doesn't matter at all It cleans e everything right off. There are no harsh ingredients and I will definitely keep ordering.
customer_reviews.author: sandy472

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle
customer_reviews.text: This is the only foaming cleanser for dry skin I have found. It is very gentle I will be buying this again
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Brucker

customer_reviews.title: The best facial cleansing product I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Dry skin with chronic cystic acne. About the toughest hand you can be dealt. I've tried EVERYTHING. EVERYTHING. This is the best cleanser I have ever used. Improved my complexion and hydrates beautifully. 11 out of 10 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wholesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first purchase; I immediately fell in love with the simplicity of the product—honest, gentle, wholesome clean-filling; the scent is light and not overbearing or artificial.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: My skin is so nice that I’ve stopped wearing makeup
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! My skin is very sensitive and with most face washes I end up breaking out. I have been using this for almost a year and my skintone is even and acne free! I tell all my friends about how amazing it is and it’s all natural. My skin is so nice that I have stopped wearing face makeup and just wear makeup on my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin. This is the first product that I can use daily without irritating my skin. Very much recommended for anyone who has sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Review

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell
customer_reviews.text: OK product as far as how it cleans but the smell is awful. It’s not special enough to deal with the gross scent.
customer_reviews.author: carawood

customer_reviews.title: D
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but it doesn't clean the makeup off my face. There is still residue, which requires at least one repeat wash. This just doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Fiddler

customer_reviews.title: The claims are false
customer_reviews.text: Smells odd, not bad but odd. Makes my skin feel dry after use. The rosacea around my nose has become irritated and inflamed. Not at all impressed with this product
customer_reviews.author: Jene Chauvin

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about this product and the company
customer_reviews.text: Really like the feel and smell and price and packaging and the company’s story... just, everything.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and my eyes were swollen with excema. This gentle soap started helping me heal the first time I used it! Bonus, it stands for all the right things and I love being able to support this wonderful cause.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn E.

customer_reviews.title: Cleanses beautifully without residue
customer_reviews.text: Beauful light lavender scent. Cleanses without residue. Leaves skin soft and moist. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SSH

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using tree to tub products for about two years now and it is the only face and body wash that I use! I love the simple and natural ingredients. They are even safe enough to use on toddlers with very sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Wold

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me. Still looking for a new face wash.
customer_reviews.text: Dried my skin out and I don't even have dry skin. It said it would be so gentle but my face is tight and swollen looking. I will be sending this back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: This is very gentle in the face very gentle. She's not that much of a sense which I don't like too much perfume in my cleansers. And it's a foam not a gel. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Holli h.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I am so glad I found out about Tree to Tub! This face wash is amazing! I saw a different in my skin after just one use! My skin is glowing & my bumps shrunk almost completely overnight after only one use! I will be buying more products!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is mild to the skin and easy to use. I have very sensitive skin and is responding successfully to twice daily washings. Have had difficulty finding mild products that do not dry the skin
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Denhart

customer_reviews.title: Best Facewash I Have Used
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin and have not found a facewash that would not irritate my skin. I came across this one and I love it! It cleanses my face while leaving it soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Gentle Foaming Action
customer_reviews.text: This face soap is so gentle and I love the feel of the foam. I'm using it every morning and can see and feel my skin is moist and more firm.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E. Garner

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this face soap
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this face soap. It is so gentle on my sensitive skin and lathers beautifully. The lavender scent is heavenly and so relaxing. My skin feels so clean and soft after each use. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Soothing
customer_reviews.text: Feels so fresh and smells so unique and calm. Love it. Gentle on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Tree To Tub For Face
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with the results I get from using Tree To Tub Soapberry For Face foam. My skin feels clean and soft after I use the product. It cleans the oil from the skin but doesn’t make it dry.
customer_reviews.author: Potiagus

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Removes make up easily without just smudging, and does not dry my face at all. Mild scent, gentle foam. Definitely buying again!
customer_reviews.author: erinfly

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this product - my skin looks great and I have very sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: What I liked the most is that it leaves my face feeling ...
customer_reviews.text: What I liked the most is that it leaves my face feeling very clean and the scent. What I liked the least is the size of the bottle. I feel it's too small.
customer_reviews.author: Mady
